mapper.select: SELECT T1.COMMENT_IDX, T1.BOARD_IDX, T1.USER_IDX, T2.USER_ID, T1.DEPTH, T1.PARENT_COMMENT_IDX, IF(T1.PARENT_COMMENT_IDX IS NULL, NULL, (SELECT PU.USER_ID FROM QNA_COMMENT C JOIN QNA_COMMENT P ON C.PARENT_COMMENT_IDX = P.COMMENT_IDX JOIN USERS CU ON C.USER_IDX = CU.USER_IDX JOIN USERS PU ON P.USER_IDX = PU.USER_IDX WHERE C.COMMENT_IDX = T1.COMMENT_IDX)) AS PARENT_USER_ID, T1.BUNDLE_IDX, T1.COMMENT, T1.DELETE_YN, LEFT(T1.REG_DATE,10) REG_DATE, T1.UPDATE_DATE, T1.DELETE_DATE FROM QNA_COMMENT T1 JOIN USERS T2 ON T1.USER_IDX = T2.USER_IDX WHERE T1.BOARD_IDX = #{value} ORDER BY T1.BUNDLE_IDX, T1.REG_DATE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QNA_COMMENT (BOARD_IDX, USER_IDX, DEPTH, BUNDLE_IDX, COMMENT) VALUES (#{board_idx}, #{user_idx}, #{depth}, #{bundle_idx}, #{comment})
